content: 1 challenge the simple fingerless mitts by sharon maher laughing purple goldfish designs these mitts are worked in the round with no shaping the shell pattern is stretchy and will accommodate the shape of your hand beautifully all you need to do is remember to add your peek-a-boo hole for the thumb are you up for the challenge can you make a pair of these mitts in less than one hour i can complete the short ones darning ends and everything in that time but the long mitts take me about one hour and ten minutes try them for yourself and see… challenge the simple fingerless mitts - by sharon maher of laughing purple goldfish designs ©2012 3 pattern begins begin at wrist opening join each round with a slip_stitch into the top of beginning chain then slip_stitch across to the chain-1 space at centre of first shell before beginning the next round take care not to make your foundation chain too tight this will make the mitts uncomfortable start chain 35 join with a slip_stitch in first chain to form ring round 1 work a beginning shell in same stitch just joined skip 4 chain * work a shell in next chain skip 4 chain repeat from * around join 7 shells round 2 work a beginning shell into the chain-1 space at centre of the first shell work a shell into the chain-1 space at centre of each shell join 7 shells repeat repeat round 2 until you have completed 7 rounds for short mitts or 11 rounds for long mitts create thumb opening left mitt work a beginning shell into the centre of the first shell chain 5 skip next shell work a shell into the centre of each remaining shell 6 shells 1 chain-5 space right mitt work a beginning shell into the centre of the first shell work a shell into
